title: SirJohnVonSlotty
author: SirJohnVonSlotty
created_time: December 19, 2022, 09:39:53 AMLast edit: December 19, 2022, 03:55:44 PM by SirJohnVonSlotty
content: Hey guys,I saw that a lot of forum members have their own crypto affiliates sites, I already reached out to some of them like https://www.btcgosu.com/, but I would love to get more contacts. If you own a site and act as a crypto affiliate, ping me and let's discuss the options  We are officially launching our crypto casino tomorrow, and I'm looking to partner up for reviews, listings and press releases.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: I wonder if crypto affiliate sites will give a honest review since you will pay fee and need to discuss about the options first. I think a genuine crypto affiliate sites wouldn't reach the casino and offer to review it, but they will act like an ordinary gambler, try to deposit, win some money and try to withdraw. They will get a same experience like the others and they will give a honest review about it, including like the casino freeze the account, ask to submit KYC etc.

comments.author: SirJohnVonSlotty
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on December 19, 2022, 09:48:27 AMI wonder if crypto affiliate sites will give a honest review since you will pay fee and need to discuss about the options first.Most of them do, and you're not paying for the review, you're paying to be reviewed, which can end up good or bad, depending on how good your product is. Nevertheless it's a nice experience and you get a lot of good feedback.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 19, 2022, 09:39:53 AMHey guys,I saw that a lot of forum members have their own crypto affiliates sites, I already reached out to some of them like https://www.btcgosu.com/, but I would love to get more contacts. If you own a site and act as a crypto affiliate, ping me and let's discuss the options  We are officially launching our crypto casino tomorrow, and I'm looking to partner up for reviews, listings and press releases. That's a good initiative on your part marketing and lead generation is very important for a very competitive industry, we have one coming up in the first quarter of the year its a directory site we are currently building our social account, and it's on my text profile its both a review site and an interview site but we are not listing new casino and requirements is at least 2 months with a good reputation but we're looking forward to having it in our directory once you announce your casino we'll monitor it and list it free and promote it free.Since you are an active member here I don't see you encountering problems promoting it here its the usual get a copper account, hire a designer and be active, of course you know the drill.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 19, 2022, 09:39:53 AMHey guys,I saw that a lot of forum members have their own crypto affiliates sites, I already reached out to some of them like https://www.btcgosu.com/, but I would love to get more contacts. If you own a site and act as a crypto affiliate, ping me and let's discuss the options  We are officially launching our crypto casino tomorrow, and I'm looking to partner up for reviews, listings and press releases. Move this thread to service section so that many could see that you are seeking for the said service. For sure many users here especially those gambling experienced people could help you with that. Also hire a person who can work with you on marketing aspect since they could also help you out to spread the word about your casino and your planned launching.Looking forward to see a new reputable casino will exist here so good luck.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on December 19, 2022, 09:48:27 AMI wonder if crypto affiliate sites will give a honest review since you will pay fee and need to discuss about the options first. I think a genuine crypto affiliate sites wouldn't reach the casino and offer to review it, but they will act like an ordinary gambler, try to deposit, win some money and try to withdraw.Have you not seen paid reviews here on this forum? Some reputable members actually participated in casino or coin mixer reviews before and their feedbacks seemed honest from what I've read. Some were critical while others are good so it's quite balanced. I don't see any difference if casino affiliates would do the same type of review.........Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 19, 2022, 09:39:53 AM...We are officially launching our crypto casino tomorrow, and I'm looking to partner up for reviews, listings and press releases. You can offer it to the regular players if you don't get enough from affiliates. Other casinos have already done it before.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 19, 2022, 09:39:53 AMWe are officially launching our crypto casino tomorrow, and I'm looking to partner up for reviews, listings and press releases. That's a great start for your casino I'm sure you know what the community is looking for in a new casino, like a copper account a well-designed announcement thread, and a very active owner and representative, if you want to go the extra mile you can launch a signature campaign a month-long campaign for a start will greatly help your casino, once you launch your casino and you've done the right thing reviewers will start reviewing your casino for a feedback.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 19, 2022, 09:39:53 AMIf you own a site and act as a crypto affiliate, ping me and let's discuss the options  I suggest contacting GamblingBro if you want your gambling site to be reviewed. I trust his reviews because he has a very solid and detailed way of properly reviewing, explaining and presenting his findings on a gambling site he reviewed. Quote from: Yogee on December 19, 2022, 12:32:42 PMQuote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 19, 2022, 09:39:53 AM...We are officially launching our crypto casino tomorrow, and I'm looking to partner up for reviews, listings and press releases. You can offer it to the regular players if you don't get enough from affiliates. Other casinos have already done it before.I am still sceptical if this kind of way is a good idea, I can already see the half-assed reviews people will make just to get paid.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on December 19, 2022, 12:40:49 PMQuote from: Yogee on December 19, 2022, 12:32:42 PMQuote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 19, 2022, 09:39:53 AM...We are officially launching our crypto casino tomorrow, and I'm looking to partner up for reviews, listings and press releases. You can offer it to the regular players if you don't get enough from affiliates. Other casinos have already done it before.I am still sceptical if this kind of way is a good idea, I can already see the half-assed reviews people will make just to get paid.OP can always set rules so he can easily weed out those people joining the campaign with lame or general feedback. You'll probably agree with me that there are many members here who actually know their stuff when it comes to playing slots or other games so I don't see their reviews less important than those casino affiliates.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on December 19, 2022, 09:39:53 AMHey guys,I saw that a lot of forum members have their own crypto affiliates sites, I already reached out to some of them like https://www.btcgosu.com/, but I would love to get more contacts. If you own a site and act as a crypto affiliate, ping me and let's discuss the options  We are officially launching our crypto casino tomorrow, and I'm looking to partner up for reviews, listings and press releases. This is a welcome development.  Getting a review would not or should not be a problem. I strongly believe you have already set up modalities and steps for  the launch of your casino which is a good move. Review you would definitely get because if you should start asking for review at this early stage of launch, you would get confused of which one  to implement so I would advise launch with the options you already made provision for then call for a general review here to improve better. Here members of the platform can make  a review of your casino site an spot their own differences and call your attention to observation made in the course of reviewing your casino. Nevertheless,  hosting a signature campaign onboard this platform would definitely do you more good for promoting your casino with a reputable Manager to run it for a little while while it is still at it's early stage. @yahoo62278 can do it better.

comments.author: SirJohnVonSlotty
comments.body: Ok guys I see a lot of spam in this thread from people that just want to pump up their post count, so I'm locking it for now. If there are genuine affiliates interested in collabs ping me.
